item.title: Don't call this moparscaper a homo!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

communist:

Isn’t anything in the http://www.moparisthebest.com/rs section illegal? Their shit or something?

No, because none of the jars have been modified in any way, they have just been archived which isnt illegal. Jagex Only prohibit the editing/modifacation of their client.

item.title: Don't call this moparscaper a homo!

this this have been untouched for long

Because Jagex really can’t do shit about it, they tried in 06 and failed.

Did they try?
What with the ToS, that will stop them for visiting this site.
[/quote]

The TOS isn’t a legally binding contract, but at the end of the day, nothing illegal is being hosted on the servers so they can’t do shit.[/quote]
Isn’t anything in the http://www.moparisthebest.com/rs section illegal? Their shit or something?

this this have been untouched for long

[/quote]
Did they try?
What with the ToS, that will stop them for visiting this site.[/quote]

I don’t see how that ToS should stand up against anything. Its like running a casino in your back garden but holding yourself safe against the law by making everyone sign a contract agreeing that they’re not related to the police/government.

item.title: Don't call this moparscaper a homo!
item.dc:creator: @Creme_de_la_Creme Creme de la Creme
item.description:
@Creme_de_la_Creme wrote:

srt8:

At first, I felt really sorry for that little kid…but I don’t anymore. He is loving all the attention that he is getting…all the views and comments on his videos just feeds him to make another dumb video. If he really wanted it all to stop, he would stop making videos and delete his account. So I think it is fine for people to make fun of him because he’s acting like a little punk ass.

I agree he sounds so fake in the shit he says, unless that’s just how I perceive all americans to sound. He should partner with youtube to show adsense

Read full topic
item.source: Don't call this moparscaper a homo!

item.title: Don't call this moparscaper a homo!
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:89, topic:271623”][quote author=srt8 link=topic=358444.msg2745384#msg2745384 date=1239588174]

bowserjr2 if I want to make fun of someone for slapping themselves, being a whiney idiot and posting it on youtube, then I will. I don’t care how young he is or how depressed it makes him.

It’s the internet, all he has to do is log off youtube if he doesn’t like it.

If thats your meaning lets remove rule 2 and 12, if someone fell insulted they can just log off.
That many on youtube are doing is near to breaking the law, but hey this is Moparisthebest home of criminal Weed smokers.

Those rules are in place so the forum isn’t in total chaos. It’s not because we care of peoples feelings getting hurt. We choose to enforce these rules, and youtube can choose to do the same if they wish.

Idiots who whine and slap themselves for laughs are asking to be made fun of.

There is laws on Internet too, but you don’t need to care, if bulling other making you fell better you can do that, I don’t care.

If trying to make other people feel guilty for laughing at some twat makes you feel better, than you can do that.

You can laugh at him, but some of your comments are not so good and should be keeped to your self.
The owner of this site that is Moparisthebest are responsible for users posts if he don’t do anything with it.
But who care, this this have been untouched for long, even that Jagex will shut it down.
Hope just you can think about that people have feelings even that is on Internet.

I can admit that I have not been so nice either, I and other called one bad things and the person and I know the person don’t take it as a joke.

Its easy to follow other in situations like this, and I know you don’t care, but people should defend the victim, not attack it along with the others.

At first, I felt really sorry for that little kid…but I don’t anymore. He is loving all the attention that he is getting…all the views and comments on his videos just feeds him to make another dumb video. If he really wanted it all to stop, he would stop making videos and delete his account. So I think it is fine for people to make fun of him because he’s acting like a little punk ass.
[/quote]
He have stopped making videos, he has not logged in on youtube for 6 days.
Right he is maybe a little immature, but he is 12.
People over 18 should know better.[/quote]
He killed himself.
Lets hack his youtube account.

Read full topic
item.source: Don't call this moparscaper a homo!

bowserjr2 if I want to make fun of someone for slapping themselves, being a whiney idiot and posting it on youtube, then I will. I don’t care how young he is or how depressed it makes him.

It’s the internet, all he has to do is log off youtube if he doesn’t like it.

If thats your meaning lets remove rule 2 and 12, if someone fell insulted they can just log off.
That many on youtube are doing is near to breaking the law, but hey this is Moparisthebest home of criminal Weed smokers.

Those rules are in place so the forum isn’t in total chaos. It’s not because we care of peoples feelings getting hurt. We choose to enforce these rules, and youtube can choose to do the same if they wish.

Idiots who whine and slap themselves for laughs are asking to be made fun of.

There is laws on Internet too, but you don’t need to care, if bulling other making you fell better you can do that, I don’t care.

If trying to make other people feel guilty for laughing at some twat makes you feel better, than you can do that.

You can laugh at him, but some of your comments are not so good and should be keeped to your self.
The owner of this site that is Moparisthebest are responsible for users posts if he don’t do anything with it.
But who care, this this have been untouched for long, even that Jagex will shut it down.
Hope just you can think about that people have feelings even that is on Internet.

I can admit that I have not been so nice either, I and other called one bad things and the person and I know the person don’t take it as a joke.

Its easy to follow other in situations like this, and I know you don’t care, but people should defend the victim, not attack it along with the others.
[/quote]

At first, I felt really sorry for that little kid…but I don’t anymore. He is loving all the attention that he is getting…all the views and comments on his videos just feeds him to make another dumb video. If he really wanted it all to stop, he would stop making videos and delete his account. So I think it is fine for people to make fun of him because he’s acting like a little punk ass.[/quote]
He have stopped making videos, he has not logged in on youtube for 6 days.
Right he is maybe a little immature, but he is 12.
People over 18 should know better.

item.title: Don't call this moparscaper a homo!
item.dc:creator: @srt8 srt8
item.description:
@srt8 wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:86, topic:271623”][quote author=jme link=topic=358444.msg2745179#msg2745179 date=1239579130]

bowserjr2 if I want to make fun of someone for slapping themselves, being a whiney idiot and posting it on youtube, then I will. I don’t care how young he is or how depressed it makes him.

It’s the internet, all he has to do is log off youtube if he doesn’t like it.

If thats your meaning lets remove rule 2 and 12, if someone fell insulted they can just log off.
That many on youtube are doing is near to breaking the law, but hey this is Moparisthebest home of criminal Weed smokers.

Those rules are in place so the forum isn’t in total chaos. It’s not because we care of peoples feelings getting hurt. We choose to enforce these rules, and youtube can choose to do the same if they wish.

Idiots who whine and slap themselves for laughs are asking to be made fun of.

There is laws on Internet too, but you don’t need to care, if bulling other making you fell better you can do that, I don’t care.

If trying to make other people feel guilty for laughing at some twat makes you feel better, than you can do that.
[/quote]
You can laugh at him, but some of your comments are not so good and should be keeped to your self.
The owner of this site that is Moparisthebest are responsible for users posts if he don’t do anything with it.
But who care, this this have been untouched for long, even that Jagex will shut it down.
Hope just you can think about that people have feelings even that is on Internet.

I can admit that I have not been so nice either, I and other called one bad things and the person and I know the person don’t take it as a joke.

Its easy to follow other in situations like this, and I know you don’t care, but people should defend the victim, not attack it along with the others.[/quote]

At first, I felt really sorry for that little kid…but I don’t anymore. He is loving all the attention that he is getting…all the views and comments on his videos just feeds him to make another dumb video. If he really wanted it all to stop, he would stop making videos and delete his account. So I think it is fine for people to make fun of him because he’s acting like a little punk ass.

Those rules are in place so the forum isn’t in total chaos. It’s not because we care of peoples feelings getting hurt. We choose to enforce these rules, and youtube can choose to do the same if they wish.

item.title: Don't call this moparscaper a homo!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:80, topic:271623”][quote author=jme link=topic=358444.msg2741213#msg2741213 date=1239376244]

bowserjr2 if I want to make fun of someone for slapping themselves, being a whiney idiot and posting it on youtube, then I will. I don’t care how young he is or how depressed it makes him.

It’s the internet, all he has to do is log off youtube if he doesn’t like it.

If thats your meaning lets remove rule 2 and 12, if someone fell insulted they can just log off.
That many on youtube are doing is near to breaking the law, but hey this is Moparisthebest home of criminal Weed smokers.

Those rules are in place so the forum isn’t in total chaos. It’s not because we care of peoples feelings getting hurt. We choose to enforce these rules, and youtube can choose to do the same if they wish.

Idiots who whine and slap themselves for laughs are asking to be made fun of.
[/quote]
There is laws on Internet too, but you don’t need to care, if bulling other making you fell better you can do that, I don’t care.[/quote]
